name: Portfolio Crisis Stress Testing
question: How would my portfolio have performed during major market crises like 2008 or March 2020?
description: Stress tests your current portfolio allocation against historical market crises including the 2008 financial crisis, 2020 COVID crash, dot-com bubble, and other major downturns. Analyzes maximum drawdown, recovery time, and defensive characteristics to identify vulnerabilities and suggest portfolio adjustments for crisis resilience.

workflow.description: Step 1: Get current portfolio positions and weightings for stress test modeling
Step 2: Get historical price data covering major crisis periods (2000-2024)
Step 3: Get market breadth data to identify crisis severity and duration
Step 4: Run portfolio stress tests against historical crisis scenarios with correlation analysis
Step 5: Calculate crisis performance metrics and rank portfolio resilience by scenario
